item.description: Labyrinths are ancient winding paths that are metaphors for life's journey. Using them mindfully creates rich experiences that range from soothing to enlightening to deeply transformational. Mia & Barb have hosted countless labyrinth walks and workshops, and have also led labyrinth tours in New England and abroad, including the Chalice Well Garden in Glastonbury, England. See more at http://www.labyrinth-alchemy.com.  Judy will add the purifying high vibration tones of crystal singing bowls and other sound healing instruments. Expect to move your energy toward joy!  See more programs at www.AHigherBalance.com
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B. Center is above Starbucks.
item.name: Move into joy with Labyrinth and Sacred Sound
